casebody.data:
WARWICK CHEMICAL COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. HART PRODUCTS CORPORATION, Defendant-Respondent. No. 211. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 13, 1942. Harry Price, of New York City, for appellant. • Charles C. Ladd, of New York City, for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order is affirmed on the authority of Stonite Products Co. v. Melvin Lloyd Co., March 9, 1942, 62 S.Ct. 780, 86 L.Ed. _.
